comment: She is very helpful and always available for help. Very clear grading criteria.

Take this course!!! Professor Wichman is SO sweet and a very reasonable professor. The workload is light, especially for the first half of the semester, just make sure to turn you work in on time. Extra credit opportunities as well… she is very accessible outside of the classroom and answers emails quickly. By far my favorite professor!

Easiest class I have taken. You could finish the whole class in a week. She responded fast, and she gave out not a lot of work because she is super caring about us. Extra credit is super easy. I love her!

Yvonne Wichman is an amazing professor and if you are considering her class then please take it. She is very caring and always available to message. The work in the class is very easy and I only had one text book assigned which is unheard of. She is very laxed on grading making it very rare not to get a 100 on an assignment. She is great 10/10.
She's an extremely fair professor definitely recommend!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria

comment: If you're looking for an easy class to do online, take Prof. Wichman. One assignment per week, minimal reading, no surprises ever, and she's not a tough grader. Very caring prof. who understands when bad situations happen and she responds instantly to emails. I only got an A- because of my own fault, but it's hard to not get an A.

This professor was easily the best option of the 3 available for 1101 online this semester. However, she is very unclear with instructions. Unfortunately she will take off a lot of points for no reason and highlight text with either no real error or complain about something she never instructed. The coursework is very light, though.
She lays out the entire course at the beginning of the semester. Papers or writing assignment due every Sunday. Resources easy to find. Very understanding if you attach the wrong file, etc. Fair.

Started off really nice, after a few weeks she became pretty cranky in her emails and feedback. Easy grader overall. You will need to read the textbook (skim it tbh) for some assignments. Only 2 essays and they're short, a few discussions as well. I would take her class again, but not if there was a better option, I feel like she doesn't like me.

Professor Yvonne is the sweetest. Her class taught me honestly more than i expected considering how easy it is. I got all 100's in her class execpt for 2 80's which were my fault. You need to write 2 essay's and 4 Rhetorical Analysis over a book about writing. The other assignments can't even be cosidered work from how easy they are!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Caring--Accessible outside class

comment: I absolutely loved her, she was so personal and caring and talked about topics that real people go through. She had a group project but it was fun to work with people in class that I usually wouldn't talk to. There was not that many assignments and I turned a couple in late and only got a couple points off. Overall it was an easy class.
Yvonne W. is a caring prof who pushes students. The workload is heavy, but manageable with Unstuckstudy and dedication. Grading is tough, but fair - put in the effort and you'll excel.

I would recommend Professor Witchman, she has truly been exceptional throughout this course. Not only did she respond promptly to every email, but she also guided me through every single point of confusion with patience and clarity. I feel incredibly fortunate to have such a supportive and attentive educator.

Yvonne Wichman really cares about helping students with their writing skills. The book she had us read was really insightful, but quite long. We also had to read an entire textbook within a month, which  was quite a daunting task. She is quite the tough grader, but is always available via email to clarify things. I would take this class again.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Accessible outside class

comment: She's a fantastic professor; however, be prepared to read, and she is a little bit on the harsher end of grading. Obtaining an A is pretty tricky, but you'll do fine if you try. She truly cares about her students, but be prepared for it to be complicated.

She's an AMAZING professor. I honestly don't think there's a better professor at this school. She really cares about us and will make sure you get an a. She is SO understanding and FUNNY, and after my class ended, was willing to write me a letter of recommendation. She replies in a timely manner too! The best teacher ever. She also loves mythology.

I loved this class and the professor. She cares so much and is always willing to help. Do the work and you will get the grade you want. The professor is super understanding of putting In effort and there is no right or wrong answer. There are two big grades in her class so what you do is what grade you get but it's all very doable.

Take this class if you are looking for an easy A.  Most meetings she goes on a personal rant about her life.     Professor Wichman is very clear on how she graded and what is expected of students when it comes to assignments. From what she has said and what other reviews are saying she has become more lenient on her work load and how she grades.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Wichman is a wonderful professor. She is kind and caring. She graded kind of hard, but gave really good feedback to help. There were journals that were graded based on effort, but she still gave feedback on those. She really wants you to pass.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Such a sweet lady!! I really enjoyed her class! She is a tough grader but she gives detailed feedback that will help for future essays. She also cares about her students' well being in addition to their grade. The course material is manageable and you will need to read the textbooks. If you put in the effort, you will pass the class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Tough grader

comment: I really enjoyed this class, and if you have to take ENGL 1102, I would absolutely suggest her. She actually cares about English and wants you to succeed. She also makes everything really easy to understand.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Professor Wichman is a solid choice as a professor. In my class, had 7 assignments and one big paper. I enjoyed her class and she's a nice person I wish she taught more classes and I will definitely look for her in the future. But, you do have to stay on top of things and work for your grade! But, there was also a SI instructor which helped.

This teacher is a helpful and caring. She gives credit for what she feels is hard work and dedication and she wants those that work hard to pass. Expect some tough grading on essays, did not expect so many points getting taken off for minor grammar imperfections, even easybib isnt up-to-date enough, though if your a writing major, she will help.

Absolutely buy the textbooks for the class. You need them for journals and then there's a rhetorical analysis you have to read the textbook for. Other than that, Professor Wichman is really nice and a good professor.

I took Professor Wichman for both of my freshmen English classes. She taught me more than I ever learned in grades K-12. I wouldn't be in grad school today if it wasn't for her. She taught me how to really write. I will always be grateful for her patience with me because I was a terrible student at first. I love Mrs. Wichman.
Such a sweet lady. Often if you complete the homework early, she automatically counts you present for class. Tough grader, but willing to read over your drafts and help you improve.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Group projects

comment: Professor Wichman is known to be a hard grader, but she will willingly read over your drafts and help you out. The rubrics she post are entirely what she goes by, so there are no surprises. She is really helpful and wants her students to succeed. There is a decent amount of writing to do, but again she will help you as long as you ask for it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: I have taken classes that are supposed to have a level of rigor leagues above all others. This class is utterly unfair. The material is not difficult, yet it is harder to get an A in the class than it is to get an A in physics 1 and 2, statics, and even calc III. Prof. Wichman is by no means a bad person, but she did not teach us anything.

Prof. Wichman does indeed grade pretty harsh, but she does give excellent tips. She is always willing to help and answers any questions you have. She is very easy to get in contact with via email, as well. The class consisted of 5 journals, 3 essays, and 2 group projects. NO FINAL!! To make it even better, she tells you funny stories!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Tough grader

comment: Mrs. Wichman made my first English class this week memorable and a breeze. She is very helpful and kind. Great introductory class!

She really respects her students and their input in the class. She is very caring and sweet. She can be a harsh grader, but she offers really helpful feedback and she only grades harshly because she wants to see your writing improve. As long as you take her feedback going into your next assignment, you are bound to do well!
She's amazing, you should definitely take her if you can.
absolutely love her best professor i have EVER had

Prof. Wichman is a caring and loving woman. She really wants her students to succeed and likes to build relationships. She is a tough grader but she tries to help you reach her criteria. She did not waste my time she went straight to the point, which is something I respect. I respect the amount of respect she shows her students.
the most amazing professor i have every had shes a genuinely amazing person if you have the chance to take her class DO IT PLEASE

Professor Wichman made my first semester of college so memorable. She always was able to keep everyone engaged in her class and shes always willing to help. I dont see how anyone could fail her class. She is a bit of a harsh grader on the essays, but she gives very helpful feedback on each. I tell everyone to take her!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: I love Professor Wichman so much! I took her for a learning community w/ Love & Sex and I don't regret it one bit! She is so much fun and is always telling stories. You have a few papers to write and she can be a tough grader, but if you do well on the other assignments, it will make up for it!

I am not the best at writing essays but Professor Wichman gives such good advice and wants us to do well. She curves everyones grades at the end of the semester around 2-5 points but does not give extra credit other than that. As long as she knows you have worked your butt off you will do well in her class.

Sweetest lady ever! She definitely cares about her students and wants them to pass. Your main grades are on simple essays that she will help you on, as well as group projects too. The class is very easy and she definitely gives you more than enough opportunities to pass. Just make sure to go to class

One if the best Professors I have ever had!!! She is so sweet and caring. She is overly helpful and SHE WANTS YOU TO PASS! You have 3 papers , a documentary, and six journals that make up your grade. I would take a class of her's again in a heartbeat.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Would take again

comment: I love professor Wichman. She's a sweet woman who cares about her students and wants to help them pass. She's a tough grader, but if you listen and ask her questions, she'll be more than happy to help you.

Professor Wichman is a great English teacher. She is very funny and very caring. You can tell she loves English and her students. She does grade hard, but she gives you a lot of other assignments to help keep your grade up. Definitely would take her again.
She's an amazing person. Understands you have other classes to worry about. Wont fail you.

One of the sweetest professors I've ever had. She really cares about her job and her students so if you have any questions don't be afraid to ask her anything! She assigns 6 journal entries based off an assigned book and a few papers throughout the semester but she breaks it down well enough so you don't get overwhelmed. Overall, one of the best!

She is a tough grader but if you work hard in the class you should do well. Got an 89.8 in the class and she rounded up. It is hard to get an A but if she sees you try you get what you deserve. Also you have other places to rack up points besides the research paper.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is such a caring lady. She is so positive! Her class talked about happiness which is the main theme of the course. She does grade hard on papers so make sure you have no grammatical or citation errors. I enjoyed the class because it was about happiness not like the other English courses which focus on just writing.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: She's a great english professor! There are 3 papers, 1 group project, and a project that can be group or individual. An A isn't hard to make. If you make B's on your papers you can get an A in the class. Also she rounds up!

I had Professor Wichman for my first English class in college. A friend recommended her to me and I'm so glad I listened. She's the best at helping her students in writing and getting use to college life. And she's always willing to talk to you about anything that's bothering you even when you're just lonely being away from home. Take her class.

I love love love Mrs. Wichman! Take her if you can! She is the best english professor. She helps you a lot on essays. She is a hard grader, but you can get help from her before turning your paper in. She promises if you give her your very best you will not fail her class.

You definitely will not regret taking Wichman she is awesome. I hit her up 4 years after I took her 1101 class for a reference on a scholarship and she still remembered me and wrote an awesome page long letter of recommendation. I will say it is kind of hard to get an A in her class if your not a great writer but she will make you a better!

She's really sweet, and cares for her students a lot. She does grade papers pretty hard, and she doesn't like to give A's on the papers. Also, doesn't explain some material the best, but she's a great professor!

She is a great lady with such a caring/grandma type personality. There are no tests, quizzes, or finals. Instead you write 4 short and easy papers and have a simple powerpoint group project. She does grad papers a little harder but she will help revise and answer any questions you have. I highly recommend her class!

Professor Wichman is probably my favorite professor I've taken so far. She turned our class into a family and even invited us over to see her AWESOME Hallowen decorations that her husband (who is an artist) created. She is kind, witty, a great teacher, and definitely remarkable. She made my day every time I entered the classroom.

The best professor there is!! She always lets you out of class early, no tests, and loves all of her students. She truly cares about your grade. Three essays throughout the whole semester and two easy projects. She promises she will pass you if you do all the work.

Best professor I've had so far!  Took this as part of a Learning community.   She was so helpful and really enjoys teaching.  If you have a chance to take her class, you should!!  I got an A and really enjoyed the class even though English is not my favorite subject.  She really wants her students to be successful and is always there to help

Wichman is the best!!!! Lets you out of class every day. Her class very simple! Class is made up of 2 group projects, 3 papers (grading is hard) and a journals (summary of chapters in a book ...... easy 100 on all of them). She is an amazing person!

Professor Wichman is the bomb. No other way to put it. Her papers are hard and graded harsh, but she gives good feedback and it is to help you in the future. No sugar coating with her. You will end up LOVING her by the end of the semester. She's such a chatterbox and free spirited which made for a nice laid back class. TAKE HER PLEASE.

She is a great teacher! She really loves her students and makes the transition from high school to college seamless. If you respect her and just do what she ask you will absolutely love this class! Shes very funny and likes creativeness with her papers. Tough grader but if you go to the writing lab she will go easier on you. Would Take Again!!
She is always there for you. Even after taking her class she is there for you if you need anything. tough grader though. you have to earn your A.

I love this teacher too death. She is one of the funniest people you will ever meet; however, she grades VERY hard. I had multiple people proof read my paper and I never scored higher than a C. I would not take her again just for this reason because I feel as if I worked very hard and it still did not pay off.

Only a few papers, and she helps you anyway she can with these; gives multiple weeks to do them. journals and group projects.  If you are looking for a great English teacher, take her, you will not regret it!
She's helpful if you don't take advantage of her.
ABSOLUTELY LOVE HER!! Take HER! she's really amazing, best class of my freshman year!
She is a great teacher, who takes time to help each and every student anyway she can. She is seriously the best!!!

Professor Wichman was one of my favorite professors freshman year. I was so upset when her 1102 class filled up so fast. You have papers and journals and a few group projects, no tests. She is pretty tough on grading papers, I only made an A on one of them. However, she is willing to sit down and go over your paper with you. Take her!!
Professor Wichman made my freshman year better than I ever expected it to be. She is so helpful. I am waiting to take 1102 when I can get in her class. I love this teacher.

I love love love Professor Wichman. I took her for 1102 and 1101. Just do the easy work like journals and show up to class. She gives great feedback on all your papers. She is always more than willing to help too.
SHE IS THE BEST! TAKE HER

If attendance wasn't mandatory you wouldn't have to show up to this class. She always lets you out early, essays are typically 500 words or less, no tests or quizzes, just 2 projects. You pretty much go to class, write your name, hear a story about her life, she tells you what work is coming, and you leave. I didn't even read. Just do the work!
Professor Wichman is the best teacher EVER!!!!!
Mrs. Wichman is such an amazing teacher. Lets out class within the first 15 minutes. Only papers and journals, and is fair in her grading.

Professor Wichman is the best English teacher ever! She is very specific on what she wants in her papers. It is hard to get an A but if you do everything that she tells you to do then it is doable. If you do all your work you will pass! Take this class if you can! She is a tough grader but she helped improve my writing. Hope to get her for 1102.

I love professor Wichman. I've never been a good writer but she held my hand and helped me learn to write and enjoy it. I couldn't have passed freshman comp without her. She is a strict grader but will sit down and help you correct your mistakes. Take her if you have a chance but her classes get full fast.
There are no tests and quizzes in this class but she is a very tough grader on the papers. She makes up for it with the group projects that you do throughout the semester.

Professor Wichman's class was so much fun! She is a very strict grader on essays, but there is enough homework assignments and projects to boost your grade. Professor Wichman is full of stories and lets class out early a lot. She is very vague on what she wants from you at first, but if you ask questions she will make more sense.

Professor Wichman is just amazing! Taking her class is the easiest one ever. Mine was part of a learning community, so we easily input the subject into the curriculum. I recommend all freshmen to sign up for her class.

Super nice and approachable, 5 books over the semester with a journal entry (300 words) and 50 question multiple choice test for each. Tests are easy if you read the books. She's flexible, like if a lot of people miss a question or its debatable she'll give everyone the points. One final project, she lets you pretty much do w/e you want for it

I love her! She is upbeat, funny, and personable. She is very passionate about literature. You read 5 books over the course of the semester and she gives you notes and study guides. No essays but she does make you write a journal entry for every book. Take her, she's awesome!
Awesome professor! Friendly and helpful but grades strict. Knows her stuff. Loved the teacher and loved the class! Will take her again if I can.

Very sweet woman as a person and a teacher. If I could have her for 1102 as well, I would have been the first to sign up. It's an easy class-just show up. Half of the time she releases early. Essays are graded pretty hard, but everything else is a breeze. 2 projects, 3 essays. No quizzes-ever! Take this class!

If you attend class and do well on your papers, then you will get an A. You have a group presentation due at the beginning, then 3 essays, and a group documentary due for your final. You have to due well on your 3 essays because you can only lose less than 50 points to keep an A.
you lose points if you miss class. do your work and you will get a good grade. very easy class. I would definitely reccomend her to others
Love love love her . You write 3 papers thats no more than 750 words . And she has no problem helping you . Very passionate abou what she does.
Definitely an easy class, but you will more than likely make a B. She grades the three papers you have to write very harshly. She really wants you to do well, so take her if you get the chance!

She genuinely cares about her students and our grades, however don't underestimate how harshly she will grade your papers. All guidelines must be followed and she expects great things starting with the first paper. She doesn't give handout grades. Work hard and get to know her and you will do fine in this class! She likes students who participate.

She genuinely cares about her students and our grades, however don't underestimate how harshly she will grade your papers. All guidelines must be followed and she expects great things starting with the first paper. She doesn't give handout grades. Work hard and get to know her and you will do fine in this class! She likes students who participate.

Mrs. Wichman is the best professor I've had. Everyone loves her because she is just so nice and actually cares about you and how you do in her class. You will not regret it if you take her but you will if you don't!
I took Professor Wichman for all my English classes and glad I did. I graduate in May but couldn't have gotten here without the things she taught me about writing and myself. She's the best!
Great teacher. Had her for the learning community. Very knowledgable and loves her job. Take her class!

She's a really cool lady and most of the classes were very short. The only problem was her grading on essays. Only a few people received A's, so if you're content with a B or C take her. I thought my essays were very good, but I hardly made a B in the class.

Easiest professor at KSU. Three papers and one documentary throughout the semester. She let me turn in my rhetorical analysis a day late because my works cited wasn't correct. VERY HELPFUL AND CARING :)
Professor Wichman is AMAZING. She is really sweet and funny and always willing to help you out with papers. Also very easy, class lasts 15-30 minutes. TAKE HER.

Seriously THE best teacher I've had while in school. Attendance is required and papers are a little challenging if English isn't your favorite, but she is MORE than willing to help. She also got off topic a lot telling stories about herself. TAKE HER! She is beyond amazing.

Shes honestly the best English teacher you can take for 1101 class. Shes funny, and classes only last about 15min long AT MAX. She grades paper EXTREMELY strictly, but she gives you a lot of gimme points. You can make a B easy.

I've never had a teacher like Professor Wichman. She really cares about us and wants more than anything for us to become better writers. She encourages being creative and is always willing to help. And she never graded low even if she didn't like my opinion. I couldn't have asked for a better first semester teacher.

Mrs. Wichman is AMAZING! She always helps you out and asks the students how they feel about assignments before she assigns them to make sure they feel comfortable with it. TAKE HER! I took her for 1101 and waited two semesters to take her for 1102! She really cares about her students. Attendance is required but with her you actually want to go!
Professor Wichman was a terrific professor. She knew her material and enjoyed her class. I wish she would have taught Engl 2110.

One of the best professors here at KSU! She genuinely cares about her students and them doing well. Easy A if your good at writing papers, if not, you can still do well. There is one big paper you do that must have 15 different sources cited in your paper! But she will help you. Take this class and become a better writer for the rest of your life!
I love her, i waited to take this class so that i could get her as a teacher. best teacher at KSU

LOVE PROFESSOR WICHMAN!!! I waited 3 semesters to take the next level English class with her because she is so much fun, nice, and thoughtful. She is just a happy person doing what she loves and I can't wait to take her again!
LOVE MRS. WICHMAN!! She is awesome and admits she was a hippy. Great teacher! easy class and VERY few papers and one group project :) DROP OTHER CLASSES TO TAKE HER!

She is one of the best people I have met in this whole school!! She is extremely enthusiastic about what she teaches, and she is very laid back. She'll admit she is very hippy. Will do anything to help a student succeed, and she likes to know you on a personal level.                PS: She is very connected around school.
She is amazing! Easy Flow of the class. Helps with your papers, guaranteed B if you do all your work.
One word-AWESOME! Awesome teacher, awesome class.

Really enjoyed Wichmans lit class even tho it was 8:00 AM in the summer. Worth getting up for. Interesting take on stories she chose. All heroes journeys. Never realized how many movies I love are based on same idea. Very sweet teacher. Very understanding. Will do almost anything to help students succeed. Great class. Highly recommend.

Had Wichman over the summer for world lit.  Easy A. Really helps to read the books, but cliffnotes and sparknotes should be able to get you through. Nice person and very helpful. Attendance not required. Very Understanding.
Very very nice teacher! She definitely wants everyone to succeed in her class. As long as you do your work and put a good amount of effort into it, you should get a high B or A. Extremely sweet.

She is amazing! She really wants to get to know her students which is unique in a college professor. She only uses the 50 essays book, so do yourself a favor and do not buy the other two. She is a strict grader so you might want to stop by the writing lab before you turn in your paper. I love her, take her if you can!

Her grading can be tough, but she gave extra credit, is really understanding, and is a great person to be around. I would recommend her absolutely. Attendance has a policy and she abides by all of those things

Very nice and a awesome person. Grades essays a little tough but is willing to help you learn what you did wrong. Gets off topic a lot but its enjoyable and good conversation. She always let our class out 15 minutes early. Also canceled class quite a few days. We did not have a final either. :) TAKE HER! SHE IS THE BEST!
Great teacher. Made learning fun. Never thought I could write but made a B. Nicest lady too.

Great teacher. No test just essays and she is willing to work with you on essays and explain what you did wrong so you can fix it next time. Overall great teacher, would have taken 1102 with her if there was room in the class.

She is a very very cool teacher.  A lot of fun in the class and just talking to her.  Her essays, however, were graded strangely.  i thought i was a good writer, but made two c's and two low b's on the essays.  very very nice and fun though

she is one of the nicest lady's!! very willing to help :) will def take her for 1102. she is a little tough grading your essays...but she really wants u to do your best!! very approachable. and did i mention nice???
She's very nice and friendly. Class can be entertaining. No homework, quizzes, or tests. Just a handful of essays.
Great professor, very helpful and easy to understand. I would recommend this class from all entering freshman.

Great professor, easy to understand and very helpful. I am terrible with english but taking her class she made it very simple. Easy A if you do the work. I recommend this class for any entering freshman.

Mrs. Wichman is my favorite teacher this semester. And this was my favorite class. And I'm a Math Major. She's really helpful. She knows her stuff. Really lax class. I can't wait to take 1102 with her.

I am horrified of English and I have an 98 in her class. She connects with the students! Just go to class (bc its Eng dept reqirement) and turn in assignments. EASY A if u do the work, which is not a whole lot!

Yvonne, b/c she doesn't like to be called by her last name, is an amazingly nice person and a really fun lady. She really connects to college kids. I did not learn a single thing about literature or writing in her class, but I would highly recommend taking her!

Fantastic teacher. Great for entering freshman. You have to write in her class...but the essays are generally on good topics with a large degree of freedom as far as what you can write about. She grades papers generously, and is more than willing to help you learn. I had this class from 11-12:15 and we always got out at 12. Great class.
Want an Easy A? You should definitely take her Class!!

Yvonne is awesome! Really all we do is listen to her life stories & tell our own stories. Grading is clear & she helps you understand. She always explains why you missed the points you missed. I definitely recommend taking her class! We only did like 4 papers & a project for the final instead of an exam!
She was the Best teacher. Easy A's I tell. Just do the Assignments and relax.....

She is an awesome teacher.  Always willing to help and she allows you to be creative when writing papers.  She provides so many useful resources to help you succeed in her class.  She also teaches Eng 1102 and World Lit.  Her classes fill up fast.
she is an awesome teacher and you can really tell that she is passionate about what she does and that she truly cares about her students.. its also and easy class if you actually show up!

AWESOME!!!  The most understanding teacher EVER!!  If you have something come up, she will try and work with you...  Wonderful class discussions...  Just do what is asked and you will pass...  I will be looking for her in the future for all of my English classes...  Take her if you can!

I LOVED Wichman's class! It is not hard at all, but it helps to keep up with the readings. There are short journal entries you would have to write, and the essays aren't bad at all. She is more than willing to help with any essay. Easiest English class I have ever taken
I LOVED her. Her classes are fun and we had a lot of good discussions. She's extremely understanding. She's a fair grader and is always willing to help you with what you did wrong. She's the best!

this is my favorite teacher at this school, i took her for all my lit classes. she's super flexible and really understands her students have different writing styles, so she grades according to effort as much as anything else. go to class, she'll appreciate it.
best teacher ever even if you hate english i loved her class
Professor Wichman is terrific. Her lessons were fun and interesting, and the final exam she gave was so fun and easy. Even people who dislike English classes will have fun.
Easy class but very intersting. Rambled a bit but stories were always intersting and fun anyways.

the best teacher i have had at kennesaw. i love her i have had her for 2 english classed.  you do have to go to class but it is such a fun class you will want to go to it! take her she is the a great teacher!!!

By far the best professor KSU has!!!!! She understands that we have a life outside of school. She is always willing to help you. Assignments require a good bit of time, but they are worth it. Everything she assigns in the class has a purpose. Do your work and show up for class and you should have no problem getting a good grade.
You'll love this class. She gives you a lot of background info to make the books easier to understand. You will actually enjoy some of them!
BEST Class EVER!!!! There is no reason at all that you can't get an A. She is a wonderful teacher.
I love her.
Great teacher but a lot of reading but it's not hard just time consuming. 4 books to read through out the semester and a test on each and one group project and a single creative project.

A wonderful teacher. One of the best I've had at Kennesaw. Sincere, fair, involved with her students. Understands that we have a life outside of school. She really cares about us and making our college experience meaningful and fun. I recommend her to all of my friends. Take her, you won't regret it.

Very sensitive, if you hurt her feelings she will talk about it forever in other classes.  If you are an Engl major you don't want to take her.  She is more intrested in being liked that being a good teacher. However, she is not a bad teacher.  Easy A!
She is nuts, but easy.  Don't trust her with personal info.  She has a BIG mouth.
An awesome teacher!!!!!!!!

What's not to like? Helpful, friendly, and caring. Constructive critiques, definitely made me a better writer. Explains grammar rules so you can actually understand them. Taking her for 1102 now. She's the best!

It was a great class. She will answer any of your questions and help you with your essays if you ask her. A little sensitive about people criticizing her writing requirements but I would recommend her. Be sure to write the story journals and finish the team project ahead of time. She's a really good person.

The only homework is reading and then writing a journal about what you read.After the first journal she didn't even read them, just checked them off.You write four essays the entire semester, which are all done in class.I took her in the summer, so she might have reduced the course load, but I doubt fall and spring semesters would be much diferent.
I loved her class,and enjoyed coming each day! Very entertaing! Open book tests.
A nice lady, willing to help past class and other hours, not the best in explaining requirements in assignments,  but more than willing to work with you. Most of the class averaged at a B.

Mrs. Wichman is awesome!!! I really enjoyed her class. She does pay attention to the content of your papers also, because I had many comma errors and would have recieved a B in the class, but because of the content and thoughtfullness of my papers she curved my grade up to an A. She is very understanding and a really great person! 1102 is next.
The best prof ever. Not an easy A but will help you if you ask. She is excellent and not a comma nazi. She is very open minded and always there for her students. Best teacher at KSU

I love Ms Wichman. She is smart, funny, caring. I am so glad I chose her for my first college class. I learned more about grammar in her class than all my classes in high school. She is always willing to help you revise your work and correct mistakes before turning in your papers. She's the best! I just hope I can get into her 1102 class this fall.

Very it-picky as far as grammar goes, doesnt care anything about your paper as long as your commas are in the write spots dont screw up commas and you'll get an A but if comma Nazi finds a miss placed comma you get a C. Nice lady and caring reading is not that bad and she makes you do journals and an outline for every paper but not bad.
VERY HELPFUL!!!!! SHe will do anything for you... her class is great!!!!! TAKE HER... that's all I can say...
I loved her! I want to take her classes over and over again. Nicest lady in the world, very understanding and a good grader.

I can't believe anyone thinks Wichman is anything but great. No, she doesn't teach to the english majors. She teaches to the other 99% who could care less about grammar or reading. I dreaded taking english and waited until the end for my last one. I would have done it sooner if I had known about her. She made it my best english experience ever.
Easy.  Don't take her if you want a challenge, or really want to learn.  She talks about her personal life all of the time and is kind of nosey.  Takes things very personal.

I think Professor Wichman is a good mix of hard and easy. Her class is do-able but you gotta read the books and pay attention in class. She makes literature fun even if you hate english. She is so smart and keeps you glued to the discussion. I learned so much. I love her class. I just wish I could take another one with her.

east tests. easy class and EASY ON THE DAY DREAMING. i had a hard time staying alert and i love lit. she speaks about herself all the time and it takes alot of effort to not sleep. i learned a little about insignificant thing. she knows her stuff but dose not teach it. her classes are for the dumb dumbs and not for the ones that actually care

Amazing teacher. I am taking her class again for World Lit. She is awesome. Very personable and teaches as a friend rather than higher power. Gets to know you and whats happening in your life and understands if something comes up. Likes debates and hosts open discussions.

VERY GOOD TEACHER!!! She is probably one of the most openminded people i've ever met. She's a little on the excentric side but thats what makes her so great. She makes everything so fun and her discussions are amazing. She always knows how to keep everyone involved. Even her final project was fun and interesting. Take her! You won't regret it!
She is awesome. If you get into her class you're lucky.  I dreaded taking this class, but with her it's been interesting and definitely my favorite.
I have her now and her class is the easiest class I have ever taken. Shes a good teacher and she makes it fun! I would love to have her again!
Fun, interesting, and easy. You should definitely take her class. Her class is my favorite. :)
No Comments
No Comments
Yvonne is the SH*T! She's so nice and so cool. She's brilliant and inspiring. Take her if you can get in, from what I hear, she's becoming a hot commodity.
Great professor, she made the class interesting and fun. She had open book tests, which was helpful. I also liked that she was concerned with how her students felt about the class.

She totally rocks.  If you want to go to a class you'll really enjoy, take her.  She is such a cool lady.  She makes writing assignments that are fun to do because you are actually interested in what you are writing about.  Don't miss out on this great teacher! :)

Class was great from the beginning. She makes every assignment fun. I really enjoyed her class, and I really liked our after class conversations. She really cares for her students and wants everyone to do well. I strongly recommend her class.

The class was always interesting. Not only did I learn about world literature, I learned a lot about other stuff too. All I can say is the class discussions always kept your attention even on a Saturday morning. She was a very open minded person who was really there for her students. She really put time and effort into her classroom.

She is the best English teacher ever.  She is always willing to help students in anyway she can.  Her class is very easy and she is very nice too.  I wish all of my teachers were half as good as she is.  I recommend her to everyone I know.  On top of her great personality she is also extremely hot.
Great teacher. I was worried about the class before the semester. Mrs. Wichman made the class interesting. I learned so much. I enjoyed all of the books.
This teacher is awesome and a lot of fun.  all you need to do is keep up with the readings and you'll be fine.  I also found myself actually learning the material here.
